wikipedia_page.main: Gregory Clarke Holmes (born 22 September 1993) is a Welsh cricketer. He is right hand batsman and right arm medium bowler. Holmes was born in Neath, Glamorgan, Wales and is son of Geoff Holmes, a former first-class cricketer and Cricket Board of Wales director. Holmes was educated at Radyr Comprehensive School and attended Cardiff Metropolitan University.

response: * Greg Holmes (rugby union) (born 1983), Australian rugby union footballer
